hook.text: It is not technically an STI, yet sexual activity is its strongest risk factor. The line is blurry.

buildup.text: Bacterial vaginosis occurs when harmful bacteria outnumber the good bacteria in the vagina.

discovery.text: BV causes unusual discharge and odor but often goes unnoticed. It affects nearly 30% of women.

twist.text: Untreated BV raises the risk of preterm birth and makes women more susceptible to true STIs.

climax.text: Antibiotics treat BV effectively, but recurrence is common because the underlying imbalance persists.

punchline.text: A bacterial imbalance with real consequences.
